name: Food Inc.
description:
Food Inc

This game is inspired and based off many aspects from games like cookie clicker and Egg Inc.

You tap produce to make food, the food will sell for in game money!
Buy upgrades to make the process easy!
Upgrade to whole new better food types.

Any donations would be amazing and will go towards hardware for publishing to iOS devices.

Discovered Web Limitation

  • High graphics doesn't work in web, only mobile supports the feature
  • Some physics calculations just don't work either, some foods will fall through slope
